name: Blackjack

name: TODO LIST
description: A user can create a list their task. Built using: ReactJS, MongoDB, Express, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Netlify, and Bootstrap.

name: BURGER STACK
description: The app allows users to create their favorite ingredient lists to make a delicious burger. Built using: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Heroku, and Bootstrap.

name: PET VOTING
description: This app is all about your lovely pet. Search for common names, vote for your favorite pets. Built with React, Ruby on Rails, ReactStrap, PostgreSQL, AJAX, JavaScript

name: FILM FAVES
description: This app is all about your favorite movie. Selecting your favorite films. Built with ReactJS, MongoDB, Express, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Netlify

name: Spotify API
description: An react app to search the song, artist or album. You also can create your favorite song or event.

name: Stay Inside
description: A social app help to meet up safety in Covid-19 outbreak. Built using Node JS, HTML, and React.

name: COVID-19 tracker
description: Analyze data with D3 to keep track the status of COVID-19 worldwide & US. Built using Javascript, D3, HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap.

name: Terra
description: An education app for kid to learn how the recycle trash impact to their environment. Built using Javascript, NextJS, HTML, CSS3, and Bootstrap.

name: Note sticker
description: An react app to create note useful in various purpose. Built using Node.js, Express, and Multer.

name: GA Motivate
description: Come as you are and connect with fellow GA immersive alumni to share what keeps you and your job search motivated. Built using MongoDB, Node.js and Express.
